meanings.definition: A transparent tank or bowl in which fish and other water creatures are kept.
meanings.sent1: The aquarium at the store had colorful fish swimming around.
meanings.sent2: We visited the aquarium to see the different types of sea creatures.
meanings.sent3: The aquarium looked like a bustling underwater city.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like an aquarium, filled with secrets and mysteries.
meanings.sent5: The aquarium shimmered with life and movement.

meanings.definition: A building containing tanks of water in which fish and other water creatures are kept.
meanings.sent1: The aquarium in the zoo had a variety of marine animals.
meanings.sent2: The aquarium was a popular attraction for families on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The aquarium building was like a mini underwater world.
meanings.sent4: His mind was an aquarium of thoughts swirling around.
meanings.sent5: The aquarium hummed with the sounds of water and fish.
